Title(s): A hymn of the Five Joys
Subjects: Virgin Mary, joys of; carols, to Virgin Mary
_description: John Audelay, A hymn of the Five Joys — six 8-line stanzas with burden: ‘Aue maria now say we so / Moder & maydon was neuer non mo’

BodDou302.First Lines:
Gaude maria cristis moderMare moder of þyn
                    emne…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…þou restist with him þer as we fyndIn celi
                        palacio

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Gaude Maria Cristis moderMary myld of the I
                    mene…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…& gravnt that grace vnto vs allIn perhenni
                    gaudio
